extendedInfo.description: PlanDroid is a feature-packed personal organizer that lets you manage your to-do list, calendar, and documents all from one place. Organize your tasks by priority, category, or a number of other methods which truly put you in control of your to-do list, not the other way around. Plan the events of your day-to-day life using PlanDroid's calendar, add reminders to important tasks or events, and stay on top of important notes or documents using its rich text editor. PlanDroid puts your life at your fingertips, take control of it!Key Features:- Create to-do list tasks- Assign tasks a priority, category, description, date, and time estimate- Create calendar events- Assign events a category, start and end date, description, and recurrence (daily, weekly, biweekly, monthly, etc.)- Attach documents to tasks or events- Set up to four reminders for tasks or events- Sync to-do tasks with your calendar and vice versa- Create rich-text documents - Import and export to-do list tasks- Search for tasks, events, or documents using global search- View your agenda for the day- View your calendar from a month, week, and day perspective- Filter your to-do list by category and/or priority- Sort your to-do list by a number of different options, including priority, due date, category, and completion time- Configure PlanDroid settings such as reminders- Manage categories from a single screenComing soon:- Integration with Google Calendar

reviews.title: Needs Syncing
reviews.comment: It really needs to sync with some external source - google calendar for example.  This is the only program I\'ve found that puts task and events on one calendar.  Since tasks do take time, and don\'t seem to get done if they are not scheduled, this is the most important feature to me.  But as I work at my desk I like to see a blown of version of my day - either on screen or printed out.  So the inability to sync is a real drawback for me.  When does the google sync that is \"coming\" going to go live?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderful for a college student
reviews.comment: Such a simple, intuitive and well-rounded application. Perfect for day-to-day personal planning and time management. It\'s great for keeping track of deadlines as a college student. A+
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Just emailed the makers, as I could not find this function :-) Not had my Nexus 7 for long :-)   This functions very well on the 7 and is the best app I have found so far. Thank you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Waiting for reply
reviews.comment: Having trouble with this app using random times for my tasks -- not the times I scheduled. Also current time not correct.  All times just seem to change totally at random.  I have e-mailed dev & waiting for a reply.
reviews.author: Laura Kalb

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Finally the app with ringtone reminders that cannot be missed. Would be nice to have possibility of landscape screen orientation, possibility to change date/time of series of recuring events, possibility to regulate volume and duration of ringtones
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It has potential
reviews.comment: It\'s great that it combines calendar, agenda, and todo. But it is behind the times because most people already Google and won\'t be able to sync to this one. Plus you can\'t view lists separately, only by color code. Repeat reminders is very confusing. Cannot uncheck items, unless you do it one at a time, ie, ongoing grocery list. I will keep my eye out for improvements. But uninstall for now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Close to Perfect
reviews.comment: Only shortcomings are that it doesn\'t sync with Google calendar or toodledo and apparently does not offer a way to backup data.  Integrate these and you have a program that is superior to all other android planning/time/task management programs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really easy to use
reviews.comment: After trying six or seven other apps that were at best obtuse I was delighted with the elegantly intuitive functioning.
reviews.author: Maegan Prentice

reviews.title: UPDATE: Clean UI but can\'t set up recurring events
reviews.comment: Earlier today I said it crashed when trying to set a recurring event. Hours later the developer released a patch, and now I CAN set a recurring event without crashing it. Now my only small issue is that when I set a recurring event, it only repeats on the same day of the week, so to set a daily recurring event, you have to create it for each day. I can live with that, but it would be nice to be able to specify the days of the week it should recur. ORIGINAL REVIEW: Best UI for a task manager/calendar. Very easy to use and no unnecessary fluff. It was exactly what I was looking for. Unfortunately whenever I set up a recurring event, it crashes. I tried creating it first as a task, then as an event. Either way, once you check the recurring box, it crashes. Even rebooted the phone to make sure. Fix that problem and this is a definite 5 star app.  Samsung Galaxy Nexus ICS
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost perfect, and lacking vital sync with the Google
reviews.comment: Planner is almost exactly what I am looking for. Sync task, calendar, & notes w/ Google=4*. Can\'t use until sync-able. I\'m want 4 things in a planner: 1. Calendar with day view. 2. Todo or task list - both general & dated. 3. Daily log, or journal. Where i can write notes about that day. 4. Weekly goal list. Where i can check off goals like a todo list, but different. The goals are the same every week (e.g. weight train 3 Xs, cardio 3 Xs, read for an hour 3 Xs, etc.) Add last 2=5*
reviews.author: David Goshorn

reviews.title: Cool and Uesful App
reviews.comment: Really Useful app.  If it would run off of the SD card instead of wasting phone memory I would have given it 5 stars. And it would also be great if it would back up to Drop Box.  But it is an app worth using
reviews.author: Ralph McCrum

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: It is easy to use.  Really good for time management.  I would give 5 stars if you could set recurring task.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best asset to my busy schedule
reviews.comment: I don\'t love many things in my life but this app is right below my boy and above the dog. Dogs don\'t do half of what PlanDroid does. Thank you very much.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app idea but really needs work! Not sure why it keeps changing the task/event times I\'m entering to a randomly different time..Very frustrating!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wtf
reviews.comment: It just makes up random times when I try to set a reminder. Kinda  useless. To bad it was just what I was looking for.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Just what I was looking for! And it\'s free?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SwiftKey Flow in document editing
reviews.comment: It\'s like my hardcopy organizer in one app, no more switching app for different function. I almost give 5 stars until I found a minor flaw: SwiftKey Flow doesn\'t function in document editing. I need it since it helps me type faster.
reviews.author: Faisal Hidayat

reviews.title: Finally!!!!
reviews.comment: Finally an app w ringtone reminders, multiple reminders and categories. Awesome calendar app. I have been trying out multiple calendar apps for weeks now and this is the only one with loud repetitive reminders. A Widget for this app would top it off and make it a 5 star!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice but....
reviews.comment: Needs a widget. A bit disappointed, but still a good app.
reviews.author: Kendra P
